sourcesContent:
// darkTheme.js
export const darkTheme = {
    bodyBackground: '#434e62',
    containerBackground: '#2c3e50',
    textColor: '#ffffff',
    subtitleColor: '#3498db',
    buttonBackground: '#4cc9f0',
    buttonHoverBackground: '#90e0ef',
    inputBackground: '#ecf0f1',
    inputColor: '#2c3e50',
    productCardBackground: '#2d3748',
    productCardBorder: '#4cc9f0',
    productCardTextColor: '#e2e8f0',
    productCardHoverShadow: '0px 12px 25px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6)',
    productCardHoverTransform: 'translateY(-5px)',
};


export default darkTheme;
